articles.title: Staff Cut Off Newborns Head, Leave It Inside Hindu Woman's Womb In Pak - NDTV
articles.description: In a case of gross medical negligence, the staff of a rural health centre in Pakistan's Sindh province severed the head of a newborn baby and left it inside the mother's womb, leaving the 32-year-old Hindu woman in a life-threatening situation.

The tragic incident took place in Pakistan's Sindh province in a government hospital. (Representational)
